about_the_game:
Explore the World of Berandal City

Berandal City is a high-energy 3D action martial arts game that throws you right into the tough streets of Djakarta City. Get ready to be pulled in this high octane fights in this action anime styled game, this anime-style game lets you switch between a bunch of awesome characters, each with their own unique fighting style, special moves, and fun personalities. Whether you like fast and furious punches or a more tactical approach, there’s a fighter that fits your style.

Deep dive into the Story of Berandal City

The story kicks off three years after Berandal School. Ucok, who used to be a delinquen in high school, has grown up into a college student with a strong sense of justice. When two of his students get bullied, he steps in to teach them how to defend themselves. But what starts as a simple lesson soon turns into a full-on war against the city's criminal underworld.

Team up with Ucok and a group of fighters—some familiar faces and some new friends—as they take on Djakarta’s most dangerous gangsters. You’ll fight everywhere from old school grounds to the mafia's hideouts, uncovering secrets of revenge, betrayal, and power. The ultimate showdown is against Billy, a ruthless enemy who has held a grudge against Ucok since high school.

Feel the joy and happiness of switching character

With quick character switching during battles, Berandal City gives you a fresh and exciting gameplay experience. Combine your team’s skills, find your enemies’ weak spots, and pull off awesome combos. The fate of Djakarta City is up to you—will you become the hero the city needs, or get lost in its dark underworld?

short_description: Step into Berandal City, a 3D action martial arts game where you can switch between characters, each with unique skills and personalities. Team up with Ucok and his allies in a battle against ruthless gangsters in Djakarta City. Master the art of combat and take down the city's criminal masterminds!
